discord_integration/discord_bot_must_be_: Cannot enable Discord Integration until you have set up the bot. For information, please {{linkStart}}click here{{linkEnd}}.
discord_integration/discord_id_confirm: Please run the command "/verify token:{{token}}" in Discord to finish linking your Discord account.
discord_integration/discord_id_help: For information on where to find Discord IDs, please read {{linkStart}}this.{{linkEnd}}
discord_integration/discord_id_length: Please ensure your Discord Server ID is between {{min}} and {{max}} digits long.
discord_integration/discord_id_numeric: Please ensure your Discord Server ID is numeric (Numbers only).
discord_integration/discord_integration_: Discord integration is not set up
discord_integration/discord_invite_info: To invite the Nameless Link bot to your Discord server, click {{inviteLinkStart}}here{{inviteLinkEnd}}. Then, run the {{command}} command to link the bot with your website. Alternatively, you can {{selfHostLinkStart}}host the bot yourself{{selfHostLinkEnd}}.
discord_integration/discord_role_id_leng: Discord Role ID must be between {{min}} and {{max}} digits long.
discord_integration/discord_role_id_nume: Discord Role ID must be numeric.
discord_integration/discord_widget_disab: The widget is disabled for the specified Discord server. Please go to the 'Widget' tab in your Discord server settings, and ensure the Discord widget is enabled and that the ID is correct.
discord_integration/discord_widget_error: An error occurred when getting Discord widget: {{error}}.
discord_integration/discord_id_required: Please enter your Discord Server ID.
